item.title: Maroon 5 - Sugar - Key of F
item.description:
For educational use.
Sugar by Maroon 5. It’s been lowered by 1 semitone so beginner ukulele students can play along.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play alongs at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6 . We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: Maroon 5 - Girls Like You - Key of C
Maroon 5 - Girls Like You - Key of C
item.description: This video is for educational purposes only. Feel free to pause whenever you like in order to learn strumming, figures and such.

item.title: Maroon 5 - Girls Like You - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Girls Like You on the ukulele by Maroon 5. The chords used are C F G Am.
*Note - I did take out the little bridge. Had some language and reference to being drunk. No Cardi B.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.

item.title: Maroon 5 - Love Somebody - Key of C
item.description:
This tutorial will show you how to play Love Somebody by Maroon 5 on the ukulele. The chords used are C F G Am.
If you found this video useful please subscribe and share with your friends. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is Chordette for Education, available at ukefarm.com.
